info.name: GooGLE Search MultiColumn (New Design 2023) v.2
info.description: Less scrolling with a multi columns interface.....: This Userstyles fill the windows with a multicolumn results page (3 columns) (based on window size) . It work with the last Google design (2023.05): Dark Gray and infinite scroll
info.additionalInfo: Same Version in: - GooGLE Search MultiColumn (New Design 2023) [Userstyles.world - USw] - GooGLE Search MultiColumn (New Design 2023) [Greasyfork] - GooGLE Search MultiColumn (New Design 2023) [Userstyles.org] With it, you can use too: - GM "Google Infinite Scroll (+ Site Icon)" by ndaesik [2022] - GM "Super_preloaderPlus_one_New": Version History, Old backup/ fork ??: v6.15.8 But you can install it from the Github Original Dev: Super-preloader by machsix [2023 - v.6.16.5] Install: Install link - Super-preloader - machsix's Github Best and Useful for the use of an autopager: useful if you have not yet the option for infinitScroll of Google and want have the videos previews working in the next laoded pages). - GM "Linkify Plus Plus" by eight [2021] - GM "Google Search Extra Buttons" by spmbt [2022.09] - Read its install notes... Note: My Old version (not Updated): - GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray (Userstyles.World [USw]) - GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray [Userstyles.org] - Google - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray [Greasyfork]
